text: What's coming and going on Netflix in March. What ’ s the best superhero series out there? Many would nominate Netflix ’ s “ Jessica Jones “ ; the much - anticipated second season is coming in March. It headlines Netflix ’ s slate of original programing in March, which includes the limited series “ Collateral, ” a British crime drama written by playwright David Hare and starring Carey Mulligan, and new seasons of Netflix originals “ A Series of Unfortunate Events, ” “ Santa Clarita Diet ” and “ Love. ” Original movies include the comedies “ Game Over, Man, ” featuring “ Workaholics ” stars Blake Anderson, Adam Devine and Anders Holm, and “ The Legacy of a Whitetail Deer Hunter ” with Josh Brolin and Danny McBride ; high - school drama “
